Title: Excludes violations occurring within a certain distance from a place of worship, funeral home, or similar institution from bus operation-related traffic regulations
Summary: Excludes violations occurring within one hundred feet from a place of worship, funeral home, or similar institution from bus operation-related traffic regulations as part of participation in a ceremony or religious service.
LawCode: Amd ยง1111-c-1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to excluding violations occurring within a certain distance from a place of worship, funeral home, or similar institution from bus operation-related traffic regulations
